headline: Chubb, Zurich, National Indemnity Launch Excess Casualty Facility
summary: Chubb, Zurich North America and National Indemnity have announced a new excess casualty facility that can offer up to $100 million in lead excess casualty insurance capacity on a claims-made basis for large national and multinational companies. The facility is unique in the industry and will deliver excess umbrella liability coverage underwritten by Chubb and Zurich and supported by National Indemnity Company, the lead reinsurer of Berkshire Hathaway. headline: 5 Stocks to Watch From the Prospering P&C Insurance Industry
summary: Zacks Property and Casualty Insurance players like BRK.B, PGR, CB, TRV and ALL are likely to benefit from catastrophes that drive policy renewal rate and pricing.
